name: Strawberry Snap Pea Salad
author: CHRISPENTINA
summary: Fat, luscious red strawberries pair with bright green sugar snap peas in a raspberry vinaigrette for a unexpected and tasty treat! Serve immediately or chill up to one hour.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or more to taste
1 tablespoon raspberry jam, or more to taste
1 pound sugar snap peas, strings removed
3 cups iced water, or as needed
directions: Whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, raspberry jam, and Dijon mustard in a bowl
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add sugar snap peas; cover and steam until bright green but still crunchy, about 30 seconds
Transfer to an iced water-filled bowl; drain
Combine strawberries, sugar snap peas, and dressing in a bowl; toss to coat
